_publicationTitle: Identification of therapeutic sensitivities in a spheroid drug combination screen of Neurofibromatosis Type I associated High Grade Gliomas.
_context: Two thousand cells/well of 17, 5653, or 5746 glioma cell lines are plated in 96-well round-bottomed ultra-low attachment plates and used for spheroid drug screening

_publicationTitle: Fibroblasts Attenuate Anti-Tumor Drug Efficacy in Tumor Cells via Paracrine Interactions with Tumor Cells in 3D Plexiform Neurofibroma Cultures.
_context: We employed 3D cultures grown in the patented microfluidic culture devices called TAME (tissue architecture and microenvironment engineering; Patent# US10227556B2) chips [24] for all experiments

_publicationTitle: A Fibroblast-Derived Secretome Stimulates the Growth and Invasiveness of 3D Plexiform Neurofibroma Spheroids.
_context: We used a 3D rBM overlay model according to previous publications for live-cell imaging by confocal microscopy

_publicationTitle: A platform for rapid patient-derived cutaneous neurofibroma organoid establishment and screening.
_context: Patient-derived cNF organoids closely recapitulate cellular and molecular features of parental tumors
